page.shortlink: api pdf export rtf function source
page.description: Exports a PDF file as a RTF document. RTFOption choices: 'Advanced RTF' - Text and Graphics. Use frames to position objects, 'Full RTF' - Text and Graphics. No Frames. 'Formatted Text' - Text only, 'Simple Text' - Unformatted ASCII text. OptimizationMethod choices are: 'No optimization', 'Line optimization' (Recommended), 'Paragraph optimization' and 'Table optimization'. VersionToUse = -1 means use the Amyuni DLLs for current version of A5.
page.prototype: L pdf_ExportRTF(C file ,C Result_File [,C RTFOption [,C OptimizationMethod [,N versionToUse ]]])

obsolete.p: This function used the Amyuni Drivers to generate RTF files. Reports can no longer be created using the Amyuni driver in Alpha Anywhere starting with version 4.6.2.7 (build 7544). The Amyuni drivers are no longer distributed with Alpha Anywhere.
